评论详情: I’ve got two significant pieces of advice for you. 1. Make sure to accurately measure your waist 2. Order it  The size chart specifically states that it was updated 08/2024. Since we are now past that, if you’re ordering now, you can trust it. My waist is currently 31”. Because that’s very close to being between XL and XXL, I ordered them both. The XL fit fantastically. I posted a picture showing how the back lacing looked. It was even a bit tighter after having someone else help me.  I wore this to a masquerade ball and got compliments all night. Even after the event, a few people kept telling me how amazing the dress looked. For the price, I couldn’t have found a better option (and I searched all over). Plus, it’s a legitimate outfit, as in not just some cheap Halloween style junk. Even after having quite a few people step on my skirt, it’s still undamaged and perfectly wearable.
After reading other reviews I ordered 2 sizes up but I ended up having to order another size up because it was still too small. I loved it…I had a lot of compliments!
Muy lindo

评论概述: The sizes are smaller than shown on the size chart.
评论详情: It’s too small, I wear a large but this large should fit a size 10 . It doesn’t. I have to return it.?I don’t believe the X-Large would arrive soon enough for the event I’d planned to wear it too.
Absolutely love it! Very flatteringand good quality
Fit perfect

评论概述: Received half the outfit corset only
评论详情: I ordered this for a costume party. I’m going to and all I received was the corset. It’s supposed to be a two piece set returning.It

I really love this outfit on me! I feel sexy without being too revealing and the skirt is so pretty! It’s also very flattering. Very fun costume to wear. I am 5’7 and 160-165 lbs and I got the Extra Large and it fits pretty perfect.
Love it!!! As a cosplayer this is higher quality then i expected
Definitely size up. I’m 125lbs & 5’8 and I’m usually a small in a lot of clothes but the Medium fits PERFECTLY.
I was so disappointed.  The corset was missing.
If you're a plus size looking for this dress I suggest two sizes more as the corset runs super small. The skirt is very beautiful but the corset it's just very small and wish I knew before buying.

评论概述: Runs in the small side go up a size
评论详情: Runs a little in the small side and the material is thin and will tear easy if not careful. Price is high for the quality, but it is very pretty.

Personally, ordering clothes - especially corsets - is very difficult for me as really clothes don't fit my body shape. This corset is absolutely AMAZING ! For reference my measurements are 29-22-31 and I ordered a small. This corset fits so snug and fits me perfectly! Tight but comfortable enough to breathe. The skirt is cute and easy to fluff up , but definitely feels cheaper. Anybody who's also 5'0'' will find the skirt to trail on the floor a little bit , but I personally want that so it's a plus. Wearing this to prom and I'm so so happy I went with this dress.
I bought this to piece together my Halloween costume and I received so many compliments!

Used this for a Ghouls weekend as part of my witch outfit and it was such a hit! Based on reviews, I ordered a 2XL (regularly wear M/L). I probably could have gotten away with a L, in all honesty. The back part is held together with a ribbon that is so easily loosened to make the corset wider. I definitely recommend maybe going up a size, but not 2-3 sizes up like reviews say. It was very comfortable and the material was beautiful. I didn’t want to take it off and I can’t wait to wear it again.

评论概述: Perfect Steam Punk outfit not too hot
评论详情: Perfect Steam apunk outfit for a hot summer day
Excelente
Very comfortable.  Fit in all the right places. The skirt was a little long but I am only 5'4".

This dress far exceeded my expectations.  I bought it in the XXL size; I'm 6 feet tall and weigh between 155-160 any given day.  My measurements are 39/32/41 so the dress fit me perfectly.  It comes in 2 pieces so I sometimes wear the top with jeans to go for an even more modern look.  Overall: fantastic quality and as long as you buy according to your measurements it fits perfectly.

评论概述: Item was shipped incomplete. Did not receive the corset.
评论详情: Item incomplete

评论概述: Corset didnt even last a day
评论详情: The boning in the corset was made of plastic, and after 6 hours of wear it busted through the fabric.
Only received the top half of the item, it didn’t come with the skirt

I was unable to use this costume for my event, and had to return it as I only received the top portion. There was no skirt in the flimsy package it arrived in so there’s no possible way that it was packed without the person knowing half the costume was missing. Turned out to be a complete waste of money and time, as well as a huge inconvenience and returning the item.

The entire outfit is very cute and comfortable. The skirt does need to be fluffed out the box. The sizing chart is true accurate so order accordingly. For reference I am 5”5 135-140 pounds with measurements 36-28-36. Sadly I am returning because we decided to go with a different theme for a Halloween Party.

评论概述: Badass & beautiful!!!  Won a Halloween costume in this!
评论详情: I bought it as it was gorgeous on an influencer I follow and was hoping it would look the same on me. It is 2 pieces, but flawlessly goes together and is surprisingly high quality and very flattering on my not so favorite parts. I paired this with fishnets, high black boots, and a witches hat.  Felt absolutely gorgeous in it and got many compliments.

评论概述: Gorgeous Looking, but it is a costume
评论详情: Very well made outfit. The skirt really is LONG! I had to drape it over my arm when moving around to stop folks from stepping on it; will probably do a little shortening before the next wearing. The corset is very easy to wear and self-tighten. Remember though, this IS a costume so you will not have the ultra firm fabric panels between the boning. I added some stiffener pieces to balance that out.  Compliments the entire night, in fact I was taken as “staff” of the event several times; real staff even complimented me on the look.

It's comfortable and sexy yet covered. I love the corset,  I bought it for Halloween but, I might wear it with jeans for another occasion. It's well made I love it. I sized up as recommended by other reviews. I'm glad I did. The skirt is made of Tull but not see-through.
The skirt fit just fine but the corset was child size. I wear a size small and have a small bust but it was too small for me.
I wear a 2 or 3 X usually. I bought a 4X to be safe. It barely fit my sister, who wears a medium. They don't know what plus sized means.

Bought this for an evening event at Spirit Mansion. Plan was to dress in Gothic/Victorian attire. I am 5’6 and 143lbs and the XL fit great with just an inch or so of space before corset was completely tightened so a large may have worked as well if corset was loosened more as it does have a 4in modesty panel. I was able to wiggle in it by myself but the buttons were pretty difficult to hook back together so it might be easier to loosen the corset and leave buttons closed (if you have someone to help tighten back up). The skirt was long and flowy and had an elastic waist so it could fit a variety of waist sizes smaller or larger. It did seem a bit long but hopefully I can find some heeled boots or platforms to help but I bet I can pin up/roll up at the waist or pull up higher under the corset to shorten the length some.
Beautiful costume, well made and fits true to size.
Well made. Exactly what it looked like. Fit her perfectly 🥰.

I wasn't sure what to expect from this but this dress is awesome. The corset is legit and really holds you in and pushes the girls up. I followed others recommendation of going up two sizes. It worked but was a hair loose if I could do it over, I'd go up only one size but still love the outfit. Worth every penny.
This comes in separate pieces not like shown or described. A bit disappointed in the quality for $70 worth. I can't even wear this for my event.

I had a military ball to go to and I wanted to not be status quo!  I got this dress and put a tulle petticoat under it.  The compliments I received were endless.  My husband loved it.  I was shocked that it didn’t look as costumey as I thought after I used the tulle petticoat (I got off Amazon too) to make it look so much more expensive.  My husband said that he saw a lot of jealous women eyeing me.  I had people make  it a point to come up to me and give me compliments.  The corset made it elegant as it was well made and beautifully put together.  I did order a size up as I knew I had to listen to endless command speeches and wanted to sit more comfortably.  I also liked the idea of having an open back so I actually didn’t use the back modesty panel.  I just tucked it into the corset as it’s attached.  If I wanted to do so I would have had to get 2 sizes up instead of 1 but I wanted an open back.  We had a photographer at the ball who kept taking pictures of me as my dress was so elaborate.  Most of the guys go out for an after party in the city so I walked around in that dress late into the night and had no issues.  You may need a little help having someone lace you up.  My husband got me into it easily but since it is laced up in the back it needs another person to help you into it.  The corset is very expensive looking.  The sleeves I was worried would look cheap but since they are black they blend in very well.  It’s a very dramatic dress yet very modern.  I was concerned I’d look like a saloon girl in those amusement park photos but this was so well done it looked like a modern dress with my petticoat.  I don’t know how I’ll top this dress next year.  His Lt. made it a point to compliment the dress.  I would highly recommend this and for the price it’s not just a cheap tatty dress.
Perfect for the Renaissance fair!
The skirt came a lot bigger then the corset, I alter the whole outfit due to it being to big & wouldn’t have enough time to reorder a new one.
i only got the skirt, not the corset top.
I double and tripple checked to make sure this item came with a skirt and I even checked FAQ and the reviews. I was truly excited to wear this for a masquerade and received it with no skirt!

Too embarrassed to post a photo! Do not order this! And if you do, order at least 3 sizes than you are!! I’m so mad I ordered 2 different dresses a 2x and 3x because when I bought the large it was tiny!! So they sent me 1 Skirt when I paid for 2! And sent me 2xl!! Not a 3xl!! So they don’t fit! So unprofessional trying to get the cheap way out
Fantastic costume. Fits to size and I love it.

I love this dress! I got it for a cosplay but honestly, I might just wear this as an eccentric dress for a date night or something because it's BEAUTIFUL! The fit is amazing and the corset top is very flattering. The skirt has a great poof to it as well and makes even my tall, muscular frame look super feminine. Love it!

I even took measurements before purchasing. I’ve gained 80lbs over a year and a half so I wasn’t sure what size to get.  Measurements: bust45 waist40 hips45  and I’m 5’ 7 3/4” 5 feet 7and 3 quarters inches tall.  I ordered the largest size. The skirt had an elastic band that stayed on okay but would come straight off with the slightest tug, the top was slipping off constantly. It made me look extremely boxy because i couldn’t lace it up tightly like I had hoped.  Arms fit comfortably, and my arms are pretty plump at the moment. It was great quality, beautifully made. I wish I had gotten a size or TWO smaller.
It was really nice outfit to used on stage

Should went 2 sizes down from chart. Listen to reviews size chart. Party was to close so couldnt send back had to take it in and still stuck out a bit. With a corset we can use the tie to make it bigger if we need to so go for the tighter size.
The dress fits as specific and looked beautifully on my daughter.

Costume is pretty well made for price and pretty comfortable. I’m size 12 US and L or XL in clothes so I got a 3X in this and it fit well in the corset but skirt was a bit big. Definitely was happy with the costume.

评论概述: Beautiful outfit - but corset runs small!
评论详情: The costume is beautiful, but the corset definitely runs small! For reference, I’m 5’9” and a US size 2/4 (usually wear a small), and I purchased the medium Based on other reviews. The skirt piece fit well (even a little big as it has an elastic waistband) and was very very short in the front (I wore thick tights so it was fine). But the corset top fit very tight. I needed my husband to also help me tie it in the back. So definitely size up! Otherwise a lovely made dress and excellent quality.

Very flattering for all shapes. I usually wear a size Large (5’4” and 170lbs) but based off other reviews I ordered a 3XL and it fit great. I think I could’ve gone with the 2XL by releasing the lace-up back which is adjustable. The front closure hooks are a little tricky to fasten on your own. I needed an assistant! The red color is gorgeous and I would recommend it over the all black as you can see the lace detail much better. The pictures are before I steamed the skirt which I also highly recommend. Someone mentioned a cigarette smoke smell in another review and it definitely was present. I let the costume air out for a couple of days before wearing it. Overall very happy and got tons of compliments.
Ordered an xl I'm 5'4 190 and it fit perfect

We searched for this DRESS for hours until we finally found this one. This was supposed to be for my 13 yr olds Halloween costume. Once we read the reviews we ordered 3 sizes up since everyone said it ran very small. So here we are two weeks later on delivery day; ONLY THE CORSET TOP WAS DELIVERED AND ITS HUGE. We paid $70 for just a top?! I don’t think so!  Where is the rest of the dress?? We will be returning immediately and hoping that we can now find something in time for our 13 yr old to wear in TWO days.
Krystal really loves her dress it fit her perfectly and she wears it a lot she would recommend this dress to anyone wanting this kind of dress.

Runs very small. I usually fit XL clothing, so I decided to order 3xl. No stretchy at all. Replaced back string with other longer ribbon string so outfit could fit, since I bought it for a costume party. Does look nice after replacing the lace. Mind this, NOT good for large chested women! Had to wear a lace undershirt on the bottom to cover up

I loved this dress. It is 2 pieces (corset top and skirt). Everything about it was perfect but the size. I went by the sizing chart and got a 3x. I wear a 12 in pants, medium shirt, and weigh 175. I have a small waiste and big butt. I should have went with a 2x and probably could of did the xl. I am going to return the item. I was going to reorder and a smaller size but it wouldn't of been here in time for the Halloween party I was needing it for, so I had to go with something else.
The sizing is horribly off, how is a 6xl not going to fit someone who wears 2xl clothing??

This is BEAUTIFULLY made!!! I’m an average American medium & ordered 3 sizes up due to reviews (obviously with anxiety) so I got the XXL. I’m 5’-5” at 155lbs. I had to loosen the back and extend it by 4 inches and then slipped it on. Once on I cinched it into a comfortable position which left one inch of the underlay backing exposed but as it’s made for this it looks perfect and fits beautifully. The skirt fit perfectly with no adjustments. It’s stretchy so it can easily fit anyone a size larger or who is curvier without any discomfort. It’s well worth the order!!! Just size up 3…again, unless already petite.

L/XL, 12/14 Jean, 36C, 36” waist 42” hip. I ordered a 4XL and it fits perfectly. It’s very flattering. The top is a metal corset so it can be a little restricting but that is a given. The sleeves aren’t tight and fit perfectly as well. If you’re on the fence about this one - I say try it out! Just make sure to measure yourself and use the size guide. The top can be repurposed as an outfit piece!

I looked at it and as with MOST "Halloween costumes", I thought, "Yea. Right." Probably some cheesy thing with two pieces of lace dangling off the back, and so on.Wrong!  It is so pretty.Problem is, I ordered an XXL. The chart said "XL"  But I've gained weight. So I went with the XXL.  It has room in the corset. So you can adjust it quite a bit. The skirt is elastic and has quite a bit of room as well.I'm usually a 14 or 16. I'm not well endowed. 40B-C. Waist is 35ish Hips 43ish. I'm 5'6, 165.STEAM the skirt. If you don't have a "My Little Steamer". Get one.  Promise you'll thank me.  Don't get a knock off.  Get that brand. You'll wonder why you didn't before.I'm pretty modest. So I bought one of the black peasant shirts and just stuffed the lace corset sleeves in.  They're just lace.  So you don't even notice.Hope this helps.

评论概述: Great for Halloween She Devil costume

评论详情: Wayyy to small. Had to order 3 sizes bigger than usual

But this, you will love it! I’m highly impressed by this costume. The quality is good and it looks more expensive than it is. The design is very flattering and sexy. There is a corset and corsets will never be comfortable but otherwise it’s great. Some things to know: The skirt train is very long and drags on the floor. The arms have some minor elastic/stretch but if you have extremely big arms and/or a large chest you might want to size up even further. I normally wear a size medium and I got a xl. My 36DD chest is just barely fitting this size.

This is a beautiful outfit. The corset is flattering the skirt is flouncy and fun with a train... BUT... the entire thing reeks of cigarette smoke. It's so strong I can barely be around it but i still wanted to make sure it fit so i just held my nose. I took my measurements and used the sizing chart to be sure to get the right size before i bought this and to be fair, It does fit. At least it looks like it fits from the front. The back is entirely wide open and the ribbon ties but there is at least 7 to 8 inches between the 2 sides of the corset. All I can assume is that the ribbon was included in the sizing chart. I'm so sad because I really do love the look.

The skirt was comfortable and fits well. The corset construction is off. Not the best option if you have big breast. I got my daughter a 3x after reading the reviews and the front was way to tight. Loosing the back doesn't help because it does nothing for the front due to the sleeves.

评论概述: I bought a different corset and put gems on the skirt
评论详情: The original corset that came with the costume  didn't workout because the sleeves wouldn't lay well on me so bought another from Amazon.

Very cute but daughter couldn’t move or breathe in  it yes it’s a corset I’m aware of that but it fits smaller than usual don’t recommend for someone who has p.o.t.s wearing a corset type top she passed out unfortunately

Like other reviews said, if you are on the fence, just buy it!  I just tried it on an I cannot wait to actually wear it, it is really comfortable and it makes you look and feel amazing! My bra size is 38 C and usually wear size 10 - 12, I followed the measurement guide and got an XXL. Out of the package the corset would not even close but there is plenty of room to let out the laces in the back to make it a custom fit and it was easy with someone to help. And bonus - I have some back problems and this feels really supportive and improves your posture!  I am really excited to wear this on Halloween
Fit was perfect. Length was great. I got so many compliments.

The sizing guide with the product photos ARE accurate. If you’re normally a size small, you’ll be a medium on the product sizing chart. I’m 5’5 125lbs and a medium fits me well.  The corset is well made, it does not give off a cheap look at all. It has some flexibility with sizing with the lace up in the back.  My only issue has nothing to do with the costume itself, this is a notice for smaller chested ladies. The corset seemed to smash my little chicken cutlets down to make me look flatter than I already am. It’s just a flat garment that is designed to push up bigger boobs. If you have no boobs, there’s nothing to push up. I put in some falsies which seemed to help a little bit.  Some reviewers said the skirt wasn’t poofy enough but I disagree. It has plenty of poof and the lace is very pretty.  Lastly, as promised, this costume was delivered on time.  I would highly recommend this costume! Very classy, it fits well, it’s comfortable AND very flattering!!
Cute but it ran a little small and it came with a weird smell
I had only received the skirt portion of this dress…. Was very disappointed. Returning for sure!
I am 5'8" and 158. 36 DD. I bought 3x and it was too big. Exchanged for XXL and I love it. The back laces so its adjustable. Good quality for a costume.
Transform into a Queen. This out fit is everything and I've mixed and matched srveral things with the skirt.

It was a beautiful dress, it runs smaller especially in the chest. My daughter wears a medium size 5 in regular clothing, we had to return it the first time and went with an XL. However it was beautiful and a hit at her homecoming.
I love this outfit, it does run very small so I had to order 2, one for the medium skirt and an xtra large for the top. But I was a hit at the Boom Boom Room for my birthday
It's pretty but it's Asian sizes so you need to order a few sizes up
Loved how this costume fit me and that it was super easy to put on. I got lots of compliments on it and would definitely recommend to anyone going for a renaissance or steam punk look!

Love this dress. I’m 5’7 145lbs, I usually wear a medium. After reading the reviews, I bought an XL but it’s too big so I’m going to buy a Large. There is no stretch, but it’s comfortable once on. Doesn’t look as cheap as I thought it would.

I am 5" 1' and 187 not sure what size my boobs are I had a mastectomy and reconstruction,....anyway they look like they might be a small D cup. The skirt is AMAZING the details are stunning!! The top is where the problems lie. It runs soooo small I got the 3XL and it was about 5 inches too small I'm gonna return it for a 6XL. Otherwise it is absolutely beautiful!!!!!!!!
I ordered 4 sizes to big and corset still didn’t fit.
The outfit was cute, but it was used!!! Smelt like B.O. I am disgusted and disappointed, as I wanted to wear it for my birthday but now I can’t.

This is a very quality made dress. The materials are sturdy. I love the look of the sleeves but they did cause issues as far as movement and with the sleeves being lace I’m sure eventually they will have to come off. Outside of that everyone asked where I got my amazing costume. I would buy from this company again hands down.

评论概述: These dresses are perfect for all shapes n sizes
评论详情: We spent more time finding the perfect fit for my maid of honor and my brides maids than we did planning the entire rest of the wedding . My daughter/maid of honor maid tootoos to poof out the butts for the girls and amazon does actually have some for a great low price as well . For the cost and this style I could not have been more pleased . As we're the men that attended as well . I even received special thanks for the brides maids dresses from both males and females .. I definitely recommend them as a top choice for any women to try . Do be sure to follow the Amazon provided size chart it truly does make all the difference in fit and comfort .

This runs small very small. I ordered 2X it came nowhere near fitting me. I purchased corset type tops before and 2x usually fits. I would have to probably get a 4X in this one. It is pretty. I had to return it, but the return process was easy.
5'6" 160lbs and got the 2XL. Talk about a hit to my ego but once I got passed that, the outfit was amazing! Definitely loved it for Halloween costume!
I cannot love this outfit enough! The fit was amazing. The only thing I might have changed was the skirt was a little larger than needed, but with an elastic waist, it didn't really matter.

评论概述: This item is beautiful, but be careful!
评论详情: This dress is beautiful and I was so looking forward to wearing it for Halloween, but the ribbon on the corset broke within 5 minutes of wear! I was so disappointed. I had nothing to wear for backup, so I ended up having to use a shoelace to tie it together for the night. Pretty disappointed.

I love this purchase. I ordered the Medium even though I'm a small in most regular clothes tops and a M-L in most bottoms. I'm 5'7" 140lbs, muscular build. I was worried the skirt would be tight but it is PERFECT. The top has tons of adjustable room. It's even flattering for my boobs, which are on the S-M size and usually get drowned out in corsets because I have a short torso. Definitely buy this!
It’s 2 pieces & gorgeous!
This dress is absolutely gorgeous! My daughter wore it for a enchanted forest dance the compliments she received were endless! The best thing is it did not break the bank!

I am a standard US size small (think Victoria's Secret) and between 4-6. I ordered small - this is not even close. I'd have struggled to fit this as a tween. The product is fairly cheap and not adjustable - not a real corset, so if you don't fit it that's it, you can't adjust it. I think I'd need a large, not even a medium, based on the size of the small. Honestly? There are sites that provide quality corsets at the same price, so you are better off ordering separates. The skirt is cheap and flimsy. Not worth the money - whatever those people got saying it was quality and great for a wedding was NOT what I received, and I just wanted it for Halloween. I've ended up using my vintage Vivienne Westwood corset!
It fits like a glove, definitely use the sizing chart when ordering but Im totally in love with it !

Flattering and beautiful! Corset is a little stiff when you put on, but after a while it’s super comfortable to wear! Buy normal size according to your bra size! Got a large, I’m 5’7’’ and around 155lb!
